level.description: This part of the tutorial will be based on creating variables!
level.how: In javascript, variables are used to store data! We will do this using the 'var' keyword.
level.task: To complete the first task, create a variable which will store the value 'Hello world'. You may name the variable anything you like.

level.how: Variables, normally have the structure: var VARIABLENAME = SOME VALUE

level.description: Variables are a key part of javascript!
Variables in Javascript have a great feature, where they don't require the programmer to specify their type!
level.how: To set the value of the variable to a string, place the value inside quotation marks 'Hello world!'
level.task: to complete this task, the code will look like this: var myFirstVariable = 'Hello World!';
